Protocols/StatefulWithHelpers.html#/s:FE.name: currentState()
Protocols/StatefulWithHelpers.html#/s:FE.abstract: Provides read-only access to the state property value from Stateful protocol.

Protocols/StatefulWithHelpers.html#/s:FE.name: currentState()
Protocols/StatefulWithHelpers.html#/s:FE.abstract: Allows to check if current state is of expected type or not. The ExpectedState return type will be inferred from context.

Protocols/StatefulWithHelpers.html#/s:FE.name: update(_:mutation:)
Protocols/StatefulWithHelpers.html#/s:FE.abstract: Allows to mutate current state, if it’s of expected type.

Protocols/Stateful.html#/s:vE14XCEStatic.name: state
Protocols/Stateful.html#/s:vE14XCEStatic.abstract: Current state of the object. When it’s nil, then it means that current state is undefined. This is a dynamic property, its life time is limited by lifetime of the object to which this property belongs and is completely independent from the same property of other instances of the same type.

Protocols/State.html.name: State
Protocols/State.html.abstract: Conformance to this protocl turns the type into a state.

Protocols/Stateful.html.name: Stateful
Protocols/Stateful.html.abstract: Allows to track current state of each individual instance of any type that conforms to this protocol. It does not require to implement anything, but adds special dynamic instance level property state.

Enums/Errors.html#/s:VO14XCEStaticState6.name: WrongState
Enums/Errors.html#/s:VO14XCEStaticState6.abstract: Thrown by pre-implemented functions of StatefulWithHelpers protocol when current state is not the same as expected one.

Enums/Errors.html.name: Errors
Enums/Errors.html.abstract: Enclosing type/scope for all errors that are used in this library.
